Title: Relates to requiring reports by state agencies relating to certain grants and expenditures made to community based organizations
Summary: Requires reports by state agencies relating to certain grants and expenditures made to community based organizations; requires listing by zip code of such grants.
LawCode: Amd ยง164, Exec L; amd ยง14, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to requiring reports by state agencies relating to certain grants and expenditures made to community based organizations
